data.title: Tim Mahlman - Chief Executive Officer at Narrative
data.meta_description: Tim Mahlman has a comprehensive work experience in the technology and media industry.
data.text:
Tim Mahlman has a comprehensive work experience in the technology and media industry. Tim is currently the Chief Executive Officer at Narrative I/O, a position they have held since May 2023. Prior to that, they were an Entrepreneur In Residence at Greycroft in 2011. From 2019 to 2023, they served as the President of Petabyte Technology. Tim also held the role of Board Member at MNTN from 2019 to 2022.

Before joining Petabyte Technology, Mahlman was the President, Platforms at Verizon Media from 2017 to 2019. Tim previously held the same position at AOL from 2014 to 2017. Tim was also a Co-founder of Vidible, a subsidiary of AOL, from 2012 to 2014. At Klout, they served as an Advisor and Chief Revenue Officer from 2011 to 2013.

Mahlman's experience also includes being the Chief Revenue Officer at Turn from 2010 to 2011, Vice President of Platform Sales at Yahoo! from 2007 to 2010, and Chief Revenue Officer at BlueLithium, a subsidiary of Yahoo!, from 2005 to 2007. Tim started their career as the Executive Vice President at Winstar Interactive in 2002.

Overall, Mahlman has held various leadership and advisory positions in prominent technology and media companies throughout their career.

Tim Mahlman attended San Diego State University. However, no specific information regarding the duration of their enrollment, degree obtained, or field of study is available.
